name: Dave Wakes Up
description:
Dave Wakes Up

Dave Wakes Up is a short narrative top down 2D game developed from scratch in less then 48 hours.

You play the game as Dave. Average guy with an average life. Something is about to disrupt all of it. As the truth finds him.

Keep in mind this game is all about the narrative. If at time's, your not sure what to do then just look around Until E appears on screen.

Controls

Use the arrow keys to control dave.

Use the E key to interact.

If you enjoy the game and liked our efforts for a game thought up, written, designed, developed and even it's own song. All in less then 48 hours. Please consider sharing. We hope you enjoy it.

http://idevgames.co.uk

Also available on:

http://play.idevgames.co.uk/
